org.glassfish.concurrent.config

Interface ManagedExecutorServiceBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BindableResource, ConcurrencyResource, org.jvnet.hk2.config.ConfigBeanProxy, javax.validation.Payload, org.jvnet.hk2.config.types.PropertyBag, Resource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ManagedExecutorService, ManagedScheduledExecutorService

    public interface ManagedExecutorServiceBase
extends org.jvnet.hk2.config.ConfigBeanProxy, Resource, BindableResource, javax.validation.Payload, ConcurrencyResource
    Concurrency managed executor service resource base definition
